summary: Manager for individual TCP connection. It handles connection lifecycle, heartbeats, message framing and dispatch to the memory bus.

content.value:
Public Class TcpConnectionManager

    Implements IHandle(Of TcpMessage.Heartbeat), IHandle(Of TcpMessage.HeartbeatTimeout)
